name: biobb_ml SupportVectorMachine
title: Wrapper of the scikit-learn SupportVectorMachine method.
description: Trains and tests a given dataset and saves the model and scaler. Visit the SupportVectorMachine documentation page in the sklearn official website for further information.

output_model_path.description: Path to the output model file

file_formats.description: Path to the output model file

output_test_table_path.description: Path to the test table file

file_formats.description: Path to the test table file

output_plot_path.description: Path to the statistics plot. If target is binary it shows confusion matrix, distributions of the predicted probabilities of both classes and ROC curve. If target is non-binary it shows confusion matrix

file_formats.description: Path to the statistics plot. If target is binary it shows confusion matrix, distributions of the predicted probabilities of both classes and ROC curve. If target is non-binary it shows confusion matrix

independent_vars.description: Independent variables you want to train from your dataset. You can specify either a list of columns names from your input dataset, a list of columns indexes or a range of columns indexes. Formats: { "columns": ["column1", "column2"] } or { "indexes": [0, 2, 3, 10, 11, 17] } or { "range": [[0, 20], [50, 102]] }. In case of mulitple formats, the first one will be picked.

target.description: Dependent variable you want to predict from your dataset. You can specify either a column name or a column index. Formats: { "column": "column3" } or { "index": 21 }. In case of mulitple formats, the first one will be picked.

weight.description: Weight variable from your dataset. You can specify either a column name or a column index. Formats: { "column": "column3" } or { "index": 21 }. In case of mulitple formats, the first one will be picked.

kernel.description: Specifies the kernel type to be used in the algorithm.

property_formats.name: linear
property_formats.description: It's used when the data is Linearly separable; that is; it can be separated using a single Line

property_formats.name: poly
property_formats.description: Represents the similarity of vectors -training samples- in a feature space over polynomials of the original variables; allowing learning of non-linear models

property_formats.name: rbf
property_formats.description: It's a function whose value depends on the distance from the origin or from some point

property_formats.name: sigmoid
property_formats.description: In Neural Networks field the bipolar sigmoid function is often used as an activation function for artificial neurons

normalize_cm.description: Whether or not to normalize the confusion matrix.

random_state_method.description: Controls the randomness of the estimator.

random_state_train_test.description: Controls the shuffling applied to the data before applying the split.

test_size.description: Represents the proportion of the dataset to include in the test split. It should be between 0.0 and 1.0.

scale.description: Whether or not to scale the input dataset.

restart.description: Do not execute if output files exist.
